name: Temara Bench / Coffe Table / Ottoman
description:
Temara - Bench / Coffee Table / Ottoman

Fabric:
Temara in colorway Spice by F Schumacher

This rustic stripe features alternating motifs that are derived from antique Turkish rugs. Its bold and exotic forms are simplified and graphic, giving it a thoroughly modern look. The handcrafted appearance is created by three separate processes through which the fabric is produced: first, the ground is hand-woven of linen and jute yarns; next, the design is hand-printed; and last, the textile is embellished with hand-guided embroidery. Earthy, rich, warm hues blend with a honey-colored jute ground, in a palette inspired by antique rugs.

Dimensions:
24"W x 48"L x 17"H

Fabric Content:
48% Linen / 29% Jute / 23% Polyester

Finishings:
Walnut Turned Legs

All of our furniture pieces are completely hand built all the way down to the cutting of the wood. This particular ottoman is extremely strong and durable and it's frame will last a lifetime.

An ikat pattern in pink, ginger, blue, charcoal and creamy white on a cotton/linen woven fabric.
Backing is a 100% linen in a coordinating khaki color.

Traditional warp printing and hand weaving techniques are used to create this dramatic woven fabric. It features an exotically patterned stripe design that gives a new look to the classic ikat, and is woven in a crisp blend of linen and cotton yarns.

name: Solid Drapery Panel - Knife Pleat
description:
Solid Knife Pleated Drapery Panel - MADE TO ORDER, YOU PICK THE COLOR!

--------------------------------- 
Q U A L I T Y

Our draperies are made with the highest quality possible using all high-end techniques in custom drapery construction. These are not your typical store bought panels, by a long shot!

--------------------------------- 
PLEASE NOTE THAT THIS LISTING IS FOR ONE PANEL.

To purchase multiples, please adjust your quantity during checkout. Multiples will be made as pairs unless otherwise noted by you.

--------------------------------- 
C O L O R

Choose your colors from the color swatch picture in the drop down menus.

***WE STRONGLY RECOMMEND ordering color samples before purchasing our panels. All computer screens are different making the color swatch photo not a confirmation of the true color of the fabric. We cannot offer a return based on an expectation of fabric color.

Samples: 
To order samples, just send us a convo with your name, address, and the exact colors you'd like to see. There is no charge for this.

Please note that our fabric samples may be from a different dye lot than the fabric used to make your panels. You can read more about dye lots in our policy statement.

Fabric is a linen blend. 

---------------------------------
D I M E N S I O N S

Standard lengths: 
84"L, 96"L, 108", and 120"L

Standard widths: 
46"W, 69"W, and 92"W (Only 46" is currently offered as a selection for purchase. If you'd like a wider width, please send us a message to order)

Custom sizes: 
We can also do any custom size to meet your needs. Just send us a message to get started!

--------------------------------- 
H E A D E R

Header is knife pleated and furnished with drapery pins for hanging. Panel pulls flat when closed.

Ring requirements based on width: 
46"W - 8 rings per panel 
69"W - 12 rings per panel 
92"W - 16 rings per panel

A rod pocket header is available as well. If you'd like a fixed pleat, please see our euro pleated solid panel in our shop.

--------------------------------- 
L I N I N G

Premium Black Out Lining blocks out the sun completely so you don't get that see-thru look through your draperies when the light comes in the window and also provides insulation from outside weather. We can do cotton also. Cost is the same.

Interlining can be added to panels for an additional cost per panel. Please contact us before purchasing.

--------------------------------- 
WE MAKE OUR PANELS WITH RETURNS

We make all of our panels with returns as is standard on high end draperies. Please visit: for more information on what returns are. If you'd rather not have them, no problem. An additional 3" will be added to the width of your panels instead.

--------------------------------- 
L E A D T I M E

Our current lead time is 4-5 weeks.

--------------------------------- 
RUSH A V A I L A B L E

Need your panels quicker than our lead time? In some cases, we can rush your project through for an additional $50. Send us a convo!

-------------------------------- 
L A R G E O R D E R S

Discounts for large drapery orders: 
atleast $700 - 3% off 
atleast $900 - 4% off 
atleast $1100 - 5% off

Please note that this discount can only be applied to a drapery order that is made with standard sizes.

-------------------------------- 
S H I P P I N G

For orders outside the U.S., please convo us for shipping rates

Please note that the quality of our panels make them pretty heavy which makes the shipping rates higher. If you'd like an exact shipping rate for your order, please get in touch with us to calculate it to your location.

--------------------------------- 
P O L I C Y

It is very important that you read our policy statement before purchase! By purchasing our item, you state that you have read and understand our policy

---------------------------------

Thanks for visiting Martha & Ash!

Thanks for stopping by Martha & Ash!
